content: The Elevation theme was apparently deleted, but it still shows up on b.org with a download button that 404s. Presume the node needs manual deletion?

I've unpublished the node in b.org, pending input from others re its deletion ...I'd argue that if there have been license violations, then the github repo should be completely removed too (people can still get to the code via commit history).

I'd argue that if there have been license violations, then the github repo should be completely removed too

I was thinking the same.
